hero.title: Your Trusted Computer Solutions Partner

hero.description: From hardware repairs to software solutions, Andre Komputer delivers expertise you can count on. Serving businesses and individuals with reliable tech services since 2010.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide a comprehensive range of IT solutions to meet all your tech needs

repair.title: Computer & Laptop Repair
repair.description: Professional repair services for all brands of computers and laptops with quick turnaround time.

hardware.title: Hardware Installation
hardware.description: Expert installation of computer components, upgrades, and custom-built systems.

accessories.title: IT Accessories
accessories.description: Wide range of genuine IT accessories including keyboards, mice, cables, and storage devices.

about.title: About Andre Komputer
about.subtitle: Established in 2010, we've been providing top-tier IT solutions to businesses and individuals for over a decade.
about.description: Andre Komputer started as a small computer repair shop and has grown into a comprehensive IT service provider. Our mission is to deliver reliable, efficient, and affordable technology solutions that empower our clients.

features.experience: 10+ years of experience in IT solutions
